product_name: Banana Boat Kids' Tear-Free Sunblock SPF 50 - 2 fl. oz.
long_description: This tear-free, sting-free lotion ensures kids won't fuss when you put it on sensitive faces and skin. It offers broad spectrum UVA / UVB protection and is water-resistant for 80 minutes.
short_description: This tear-free, sting-free lotion ensures kids won't fuss when you put it on sensitive faces and skin. It offers broad spectrum UVA / UVB protection and is water-resistant for 80 minutes.
